patthana23.54:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.54:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.54:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
